name: Mr. Otto: The Strange Potato
description:
Mr. Otto: The Strange Potato was developed during the first Gamejam of the 99lab (www.laboratorio99.com.br), the 99jam.

Team:

Artist: Camila Alves || Programmers: Jorge Vilas Boas, David Sousa || Sound Designer: Alessandro Galma

Special thanks to: Tiago Melo, Daniel Caldas, Fabíola Monteiro, Felipe Goulart, Ariel Rodrigues, Everton Toyama, REnato Júunior, Felipe Dias. Also: Lumentech!

The theme of the 99jam was "Strange things".
